text: Ane ame manavine potana mata-pita sathe sadavartana karavano adesa apyo che, teni mam e tene kasta vethine garbhamam rakhyo ane kasta vethine tene janama apyo, tena garbha ane dudha chodavavano samayagalo trisa mahinano che, tyam sudhi ke jyare te potani pukhtavaye ane calisa varse pahoncayo to kaheva lagyo â€œhe mara palanahara! Mane sadabudhdhi apa ke hum tari te ne'amata no abhara manum je te mara para ane mara mata-pita para inama kari che, ane hum eva sadakaryo karum jenathi tum prasanna thaya ane tum mari santanane pana pramanika banava, hum tari tarapha ja maphi mangu chum ane hum musalamano manthi chum
